pr_title: [TE] frontend - harleyjj/alert-details - change alert charting logic …

timeline.bodyText: The picky requirement, I suggest using isInAnomalyRang for a boolean value. It's a clear variable name to express the variable type. it will enhance code readability.
timeline.author: zhangloo333

replies.bodyText: also, please make sure series has Current and timestamps properties.
replies.author: zhangloo333

timeline.message: [TE] frontend - harleyjj/alert-details - change alert charting logic to be agnostic of whether anomaly timestamps are included in data timestamps
